column4: can SOMEBODY please please help me? i tried everything in order to change my resolution...i have an intel chipset so i have to use 915resolution...but i did follow a few guides and i didnt succed in changing it from 1024x768 to 1280x800 can somebody help me please
did you modify your xorg.xonf file so it knows the new resolution is available?
it doesnt work through the xorg.conf
